m_szDocTitle: Patent US20120064409 - Graphene-enhanced anode particulates for lithium ion batteries - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Graphene-enhanced anode particulates for lithium ion batteries US 20120064409 A1 Abstract A nano graphene-enhanced particulate for use as a lithium-ion battery anode active material, wherein the particulate is formed of a single sheet of graphene or a plurality of graphene sheets and a plurality of fine anode active material particles with a size smaller than 10 Î¼m. The graphene sheets and the particles are mutually bonded or agglomerated into the particulate with at least a graphene sheet embracing the anode active material particles. The amount of graphene is at least 0.01% by weight and the
